reviews.review_msg: When students share their opinions, she always disagree. Makes the class very hard to take.Grading  criteria is not clear as well. Does not give good feedback.

This professor was difficult to reach and her expectations were very unclear. She was unprepared for lectures, and did not seem to care about whether her students were succeeding in the course or not. She asked not to be reached via email, but then did not give out her office hours. If you can avoid taking this class by her you should.
Not available to reach, did not respond to emails, gavee little to no feedback on testsworks. Class reading focuses primarily on Nietzsche.
Good person, yet not very good teacher. Most readings are not interesting and lectures are especially boring.

He is a very humble teacher with a relaxed attitude. Explains lectures down to the most minute details and is ready to help whenever you need. The lectures are fun and often small. Readings are crucial but easy.
